overview:
Ian Reardon is a software developer who founded MyApartmentMap.com, Newspond.com and SagamoreLobster.com.

Ian graduated from Rochester Institute of Technology (RIT) in 2002 with a B.S. in Computer Science. While attending RIT and for several years after graduating, Ian worked at Alstom Signaling developing real time railway control systems.

After moving to Boston, Ian worked for Autonomy and Fast Search & Transfer (now Microsoft) developing enterprise search solutions.

In 2006, Ian left the software industry to attend Suffolk University Law School to pursue a legal career in intellectual property.

While attending Law School, Ian developed MyApartmentMap - An apartment search engine that plots apartment listings on Google Maps. Newspond - An advanced AI news engine that finds complex relationships between news articles. Sagamore Lobster - An online store that ships live Maine lobster all over the United States.

Ian will graduate from Suffolk University Law School in May of 2009.
